name: Bitcoin and Ethereum Standard
description: BEST token is issued by BESToken Mining Limited. Each BEST token anchors 0.01T real Bitcoin hashrate and 0.03M Ethereum hashrate. Staking 1 BEST entails a continuous BTC mining income from 0.01T/s Bitcoin hashrate and an ETH mining income from 0.03M/s Ethereum hashrate. BEST holders enjoy both mining income and market liquidity. In doing this, BEST helps each participant to effectively participate in the mining business.
